remarks: Well Founded Induction schema, using implicit substitution. (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 29-Jan-2011.)
statement:
wfis2f.1 $e |- R We A $.
wfis2f.2 $e |- R Se A $.
wfis2f.3 $e |- F/ y ps $.
wfis2f.4 $e |- ( y = z -> ( ph <-> ps ) ) $.
wfis2f.5 $e |- ( y e. A -> ( A. z e. Pred ( R , A , y ) ps -> ph ) ) $.
wfis2f $p |- ( y e. A -> ph ) $.
$d A y $.
$d A y z $.
$d R y $.
$d R y z $.
$d ph z $.
